Event Details

Event name cannot be empty !
Please select an event category !

Event Overview cannot be empty ! Event Overview details are too short !

Venue Details

Venue name cannot be empty ! Venue name length can't be less than 3 !
Please select a City !
Please select an Event Area !
Address cannot be empty ! Address length cannot be less than 5 !

Event Schedule

Please select the checkbox only if this event is repetitive (either weekly or monthly), otherwise directly select the number of days.

Please select no. of days for the event !
